reviewText: HueBots is a great puzzlegame. It might not do anything very different iin comparison to other games in this genre, but it does it exceptionally well. The artstyle is clean and fits very well. There is also a lot of variety and manages to keep you entertained all the time by introducing new elements. I would recommend this game for people that loves puzzle games and loves to get a challenge.

reviewText: This is an excellent puzzle game. The colorful aesthetics are great, the levels are complex and challenging, and it's clear that the game's development team put serious effort into its design. It's a fairly short game and I recommend picking it up.

reviewText: Could only play levels in first world due to issue with my video card, but I have a wacky set-up running Linux, so probably not indicative of an issue for anybody else. The first world levels, at least, were fun and it's easy to see how complex gameplay is going to emerge over the suceeding levels. The interface is nice and clean. A solid thinking puzzler.

reviewText: Great game, challenging puzzles. Buy if you like to test your brain.

reviewText: Simple, but good. If you love puzzle games for the sake of doing puzzles, by all means get this game. If you want to get this for story, n-no.. no.. Don't do that. But any way if you like puzzle games get this its quite a fun little game and really doesn't cost much.
